resources.string: This will allow the app to find and connect Bluetooth accessories. This app may also use Bluetooth to locate Bluetooth device.
To add or use Bluetooth devices, enable Bluetooth on your mobile phone.
The App can use camera to take new profile and to scan QR Code.
The information can only be shared with your consent.
The information can only be updated with your consent.
You can control all \"Home\" devices in the app.
The purpose of the app connecting to the local network: enable pairing and control of the devices connected to the local area network
The app can provide temperature and humidity according to your location. \"Leave or Arrive (beta)\" always requests access to your location.
The app can provide temperature and humidity according to your location. \"Leave or Arrive (beta)\" always requests access to your location.
Please enable location Service to use smart, device timer, weather and time zone information
The app requests microphone access to control smart devices.
We need your authorization to save pictures and videos in albums.
The app requests access to your albums for profile photo uploading.
To support login and social sharing features, we have integrated library that will use your device identifier to suggest ads of interest to you
The name is already being used, please try another name.
Your account data has been updated. You can no longer use the account in the old app version. Please upgrade the app as soon as possible.
Click Get Code to send the verification code to the email: %s
Click Get Code to send the verification code to the mobile number: %s
Ensure that the device is powered on.
Search timed out. No devices found.
If your Wi-Fi signal type is 5 GHz, set it to 2.4 GHz first.
Select a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network and enter the password.
Ensure that the Wi-Fi signal is good.
Administrator can manage device, smart, room and home member. Home member can only use device and Scene.

Link your %s account with Amazon Alexa
The App will have the following permissions after authorization:
You can unlink your account anytime
Available in \"Me - More Services - Alexa\" settings
Unable to connect?\nView connection methods in the Alexa app.
If you need to unlink, please go to Alexa App to disable %s skill.
Binding your app account to your Amazon account allows you to control Alexa-enabled devices through Amazon Echo speakers (ex. \"Alexa, turn on light.\")
Account authorization failed. Try again later.
Your %1$s account %2$s has been authorized to %3$s in Alexa.
%2$s under your %1$s account has been licensed to the %3$s Alexa Skill.

Alexa, turn on light

Alexa, set air conditioning to 20°C

Alexa, turn off diffuser

Alexa, increse air conditioner by 3 degrees
You can control Alexa-enabled devices with Amazon Alexa speakers, such as
Your device already supports Amazon Alexa, which you can access in one click.
This app is a test package and is used for testing only.
This app is an enterprise package used only for testing, not for launch on app platforms.
You cannot access the app because your free trial has expired.
Would you like to rate us?
Before adding the device, configure the gateway.
The search process should take about two minutes. Please do not try to use the app during this time.
Bluetooth is used widely in location Scene. Enable GPS (positioning) services for proper service use.
Failed to add %s device(s). Try to add them again.
The device has been added to 8 groups
Make sure that the distance between the mobile phone and the device is less than 5 meters and Bluetooth is connected.
Failed to access the phone\'s Bluetooth. Enable access to Bluetooth for %s in Settings.
Your mobile phone does not support Bluetooth.
Enable Bluetooth on your mobile phone first
Please confirm that the phone Bluetooth is turned on and as close as possible to the device
3 Enable access to the camera for %s.
A single Bluetooth mesh device, Zigbee device, or infrared (IR) device cannot be shared. Such a device can be shared only with relevant devices.

Failed to find the router. Perform the following steps to solve the problem.
You may tap the following button to solve the problem.
We do not yet support 5GHz Wi-F
Hotspot error, please reconnect to the correct hotspot
Devices do not support 5 GHz routers.

1. Incorrect Wi-Fi password. Check and enter the correct password.
2. Your camera only supports 2.4G networks, and not 5G networks.
3. Unstable network connection. Place your camera and mobile phone as close to the router as possible.
4. If the preceding problems do not exist, reset your camera and try again.
Tap + to add a smart device.
Current version does not support this feature. To use this feature, please upgrade the version.

Enter your Wi-Fi name or allow location access to find nearby Wi-Fi devices.
The device supports 2.4 GHz routers only. Change a Wi-Fi network or set the router signal type to 2.4 GHz and try again.
Confirm that the indicator blinks quickly.
How do I put the device into pairing mode?
Make sure the device is in pairing mode
The current Wi-Fi is a mixed network. It is recommended to change the indicator light to slow flash. Do you want to switch?
The current Wi-Fi is a mixed network. It is recommended to use the slow flash to distribute the network. Do you want to switch?
Your mobile phone is connected to 5 GHz Wi-Fi. If the device does not support 5 GHz Wi-Fi, please change to 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi. Continue?
Suitable for slow flashing of indicators
If your Wi-Fi is 5GHz, please set it to 2.4GHz first.
1. Please connect your phone to the hotspot shown below
2. Return to this app and continue adding devices

1. Check whether the device is powered normally.\n2. Check whether the Wi-Fi network is normal.\n3. Reset the device and add it again.

Related Smart will be disabled after the device is deleted.
Failed to change the device name
The device does not belong to the current home or has been removed.
If a permanent resident in your home has an account, we recommend that you set the account as a family member and share all your family devices and \"Tap-To-Run\" Scene with the family member.

Some devices has been shared with these users
The device is turned off. Please turn it on first.

Connection failed.\nCheck the network and device.
System error, please try again later
Your app has quit unexpectedly multiple times. We recommend you clear the cache and restart the app.
Only 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi networks are supported
Your mobile phone is connected to 5 GHz Wi-Fi. If the device does not support 5 GHz Wi-Fi, please change to 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi. Continue?
This account does not support the family mode and cannot be added to your family. We recommend that you contact the account owner to upgrade the app to the latest version.
Failed to save. The account cannot be empty.

Please contact with the administrator to get an invitation (Home Settings > Add Member)

Define Permission on Room and Smart Setting
Manage Device and Room | Manage Smart Setting | Manage Member
Only after accepting the invitation will the account owner become a family member and be able to use relevant functions.
Please enter a home member name
Home owner can link additional accounts to Home. Administrator/Home member can use the linking account to sign up and log in to Home.
After transferring the home ownership to \"%s\", you will no longer be the home owner.
Detail your problem or dissatisfaction, for example, when the issue occurred, what functions you want, etc.
Please submit any concerns or feedback you may have\nto help us improve.
No more than 300 characters for a feedback message
You have sent feedback, please wait for our reply
Optional, but the information is important for us to contact you.
Ensure that the device is fully charged during the firmware download.
Due to the time change of summer and winter, update your device according to the following instructions to ensure effective timing function.
The update failed. Check the network connection and try again.
Power off the device, restart it, and try again
Updating firmware...Do not cut off the device\'s power supply.
1. Please keep the power of the device connected during the upgrade process. \n2. The device cannot be used during the upgrade process, please be patient.

1. Please keep the Bluetooth device power connected. \n2. The device will not be used during the upgrade process, please be patient. \n3. Do not leave the current page or exit the application or switch to other applications during Bluetooth device upgrade.
Waking up the device. It may take some time. You can do other operations while waiting.
Please keep power on while updating, please wait.

The App will have the following permissions after authorization.

After connecting your App account and Google account, you can use Google Home Smart Speakers to control devices that work with Google Assistant. For example, you can say, \"OK Google, please turn on the light.\"

OK Google, turn on light

OK Google, brighten my light

OK Google, change kitchen lamp to blue

OK Google, set my light to 50%
You can cancel the permission anytime.

Turn on the bathroom lamps"
"Turn off the lights"

The name will be used for associated notifications and \"Automation\"Scene service. Changing the name will not change the content of historical notification messages.
Your camera detected %s new faces, tap here to tag them
Use the face recognition feature in compliance with the local law. You may need to get consent of visitors before you use this feature.
If you delete the recognition records, videos of the corresponding persons will be deleted and cannot be retrieved. Perform the operation with caution.

You have not purchased the Cloud Storage for Videos service. You cannot access the video recordings.
Your service has expired. Data will be cleared in 30 days. Renew the service now.

Speech may be affected by the environment. We recommend that you select one-way or two-way speech according to the actual situation.
All videos of this day will be deleted. This action cannot be restored.
All videos of this day will be deleted. This action cannot be restored.
Cloud service expired. Please renew your plan. You can still check your records, but the data will be gradually deleted.
You are not subscribed to the cloud service.
With Cloud Service, your camera will record what\'s happening and keep it safe in the Cloud.
Download completed, video will be saved in your gallery.
If the video you selected include multiple events, they will be merged into one video. During the download process, please keep the app in the front-end.
Both the device\'s video cloud storage service and video data belong to the home.\nIf you change the device\'s home, you will need to purchase services again.
The mobile phone connects to the device\'s Wi-Fi hotspot and transmits network configuration information to the device.
The mobile phone will broadcast network configuration information. After receiving the information, the device will connect to the router.
Use the camera to scan the QR code on the mobile phone, which contains net-pairing information.
Select a correct pairing mode based on the device type or refer to the user manual.
Use a network cable to connect the device to a router. Register and add the device to the cloud.

1. Ensure that the lens is not blocked. If the camera lens has a protective film, remove it before you scan the QR code.\n\n2. Place the app QR code in front of the camera at a distance of 15 cm to 20 cm. Adjust the angle and distance until you hear a prompt.
Why is there no prompt from the camera?
Align the QR code with the camera lens at a distance of 20 cm to 30 cm.\nuntil you hear a prompt.
Use Camera to Scan QR Code
After Early Termination is enabled, if no PIR event triggers the video recording in 10s during recording duration, the device will go to sleep.

After this function is enabled, recordings will be stored on the memory card only when the camera detects motions, helping save memory card resources.
Your camera has no storage device
1. Use a FAT32 memory card.\n2. If the memory card cannot be recognized, remove and reinsert it.

When AP mode is enabled, the device will directly release the hotspot you specified. You can connect your phone to a hotspot and use your device.
Unable to connect to your device. Please make sure the device is connected to the internet or is in AP mode.
You can now continue to use your device by switching your phone Wi-Fi to %s.
Your device will automatically connect to the router. If the original Wi-Fi is no longer available, you can reset your device and set up the network.
If you need to restart the device while in AP Mode, please restart then use the app to synchronize the configuration. Otherwise, the recording function will not work properly.
The camera will continue to work until the battery runs out.
The camera only works when the PIR sensor triggered. The battery can last for a long time in this mode.
You can set the position as a preset point for automation. For example, you can set your camera to pan to preset point 1 when your window sensor is triggered.
Please rotate the camera to a specified positon and tap save to save it as a preset point.

If the app malfunctions or crashes, upload logs to help us better locate and resolve the issue.

Cloud storage<&&>After registration, your device data will be uploaded to and stored in the cloud to improve information synchronization.<&&>Third-party voice control<&&>Access to other thrid-party voice assistants, such as Amazon Alexa, Google Home, etc. <&&>Device sharing<&&>Share your devices with your friends and family members.
After submiting your detailed information, you will be able to use the following features:

Cloud storage<&&>After registration, your device data will be uploaded and stored in the cloud to improve information synchronization.<&&>Third-party voice control<&&>Access to other thrid-party voice assistants, such as Amazon Alexa, Google Home, etc. <&&>Device sharing<&&>Share your devices with your friends and family members.
Complete filling in your information to store your data in the cloud.
All the data will be removed after you exit
You will not be able to use the following functions without an account:

Based on the requirements of data privacy security specifications, the servers in each region are independent of each other. After the region is switched, the devices bound to the current account will not be migrated to the server in the new region, and the data of the previous server will only be retained for 7 days. Device data will be logged off, please proceed with caution!

For the best experience using the app, select the country or region where you are located. In compliance with data privacy and security requirements, servers in different countries or regions are independent from one another.
Before changing the country or region, read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
This account already exists. Do you want to log in?
The user has been not registered. Do you want to register now?
Experience mode does not support the following features

We understand the importance of privacy. In order to more fully present our collection and use of your personal information, we have revised our privacy policy and user agreement in detail in accordance with the latest laws and regulations. When you click [Agree], you have fully read, understood and accepted all of the updated Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Please take some time to become familiar with our privacy policy, and if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

We pay high attention to the privacy of personal information. To fully present how we collect and use your personal information, we revised the Privacy Policy in detail in compliance with the latest laws and regulations. By clicking I Agree, you agree that you have fully read, understood, and accepted all the content of the revised Privacy Policy. Please take your time to read the Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, please contact us anytime.

The device and mobile need to use the same Wi-Fi
The diagnosis process should take about two minutes. You can cancel it at any time.
Performing a network diagnosis will help us solve your network problems faster. The diagnosis takes about two minutes.

To connect to the Internet: 

In your mobile phone's WLAN settings, check whether there is any WLAN available.
Check whether the mobile phone is connected to the mobile network and is in service.

If your mobile phone is already connected to a WLAN:

Check whether the WLAN hotspot is connected to the Internet or whether the hotspot allows your device to access the Internet.

1. Check your network connection<&&>The information can't be displayed if the network signal is weak. 
 Please reconnect or change the network and try again.<&&>2. Check if the application network permission is on.<&&>.The application data will be unavailable if the application network permission is off. 
 Please go to Settings - Cellular to check if you have turned on the app permission.<&&>3. Check your phone system and model.<&&>. If your iPhone is in the China version and using iOS 10, the problem may due to your iOS system. Please: 
1. Go to Settings - Cellular and turn on Wi-Fi Assist
2. Switch the network permission of all applications in Cellular 
3. Close the app and restart your iPhone

.

After being removed, you cannot operate devices and \"Tap-To-Run\" Scene of the family.

You can edit the custom \"Tap-To-Run\" Scene after adding devices to it. For example, turn the air conditioner on and close the curtains when you arrive home, and turn lamps off and lock the doors and windows when you leave home.

Please provide your phone number to turn on Message Notification. Your phone number will not be used for any other purposes. (Message Notification is not allowed if you do not provide your number)
We need your phone number only to provide you with the phone notification service and will not use it for other purposes. If you do not provide your phone number, the phone notifications won\'t work.

The sub-device and smart scenario under a damaged gateway can be moved to %s:
How to find the device SN code/device ID?

1. You can only use gateway under the same Home to replace the damaged one. 
2. Ensure the new gateway is connected to a power source and does not have sub-devices. 
3. Ensure the damaged gateway is off. 
4. The damaged gateway will be moved from the current Home after it is replaced. 
5. Please do not use damaged gateway and new gateway in the same Zigbee network after replacing.
No available gateway. If the gateway is removed, please go to the last page and enter SN code.

Bluetooth update is being processed, please do not lock screen or switch to other app.

1. Please keep the Bluetooth device power connected. 
2. The device will not be used during the upgrade process, please be patient. 
3. Keep a distance of less than 5 meters between the phone and the device during the upgrade process. 
4. Do not leave the current page or exit the application or switch to other applications during Bluetooth device upgrade.
Make sure that the distance between the mobile phone and the device is less than 5 meters and Bluetooth is connected.
